mapper.select: SELECT o_teacher.id,o_testpaper.*,o_classes.name ClassesName FROM oj.o_teacher,oj.o_testpaper,oj.o_classes WHERE o_teacher.no = #{userName} AND o_testpaper.classes_id = o_classes.id AND o_teacher.id = o_testpaper.teacher_id AND o_teacher.id = o_classes.teacher_id

SELECT otc.classes_id clID,teacher.id TeacherId,classes.name ClassesName FROM o_teacher teacher LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from o_teacher_classes) otc ON otc.teacher_id = teacher.id LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from o_classes) classes ON classes.id = otc.classes_id WHERE teacher.no = #{userName}
